summary: KVM: arm64: Prevent kmemleak from accessing pKVM memory
details:
KVM: arm64: Prevent kmemleak from accessing pKVM memory

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.8 by commit a6b22d1143931f0036932cdaa8a5eb34cb3b12c8, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit a7259df7670240ee03b0cfce8a3e5d3773911e24. For more details please see the references link.
